component.name: geocoder
component.title: Geocoder
component.description: Find geocodes (latitude and longitude) for a given address or the other way round.
component.label: api,location

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

autowiredEnabled.label: advanced
autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

address.description: The geo address which should be prefixed with address:

latlng.description: The geo latitude and longitude which should be prefixed with latlng:

headersOnly.description: Whether to only enrich the Exchange with headers, and leave the body as-is.

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

serverUrl.description: URL to the geocoder server. Mandatory for Nominatim server.

type.description: Type of GeoCoding server. Supported Nominatim and Google.

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

proxyAuthDomain.label: proxy
proxyAuthDomain.description: Proxy Authentication Domain to access Google GeoCoding server.

proxyAuthHost.label: proxy
proxyAuthHost.description: Proxy Authentication Host to access Google GeoCoding server.

proxyAuthMethod.label: proxy
proxyAuthMethod.description: Authentication Method to Google GeoCoding server.

proxyAuthPassword.label: proxy
proxyAuthPassword.description: Proxy Password to access GeoCoding server.

proxyAuthUsername.label: proxy
proxyAuthUsername.description: Proxy Username to access GeoCoding server.

proxyHost.label: proxy
proxyHost.description: Proxy Host to access GeoCoding server.

proxyPort.label: proxy
proxyPort.description: Proxy Port to access GeoCoding server.

apiKey.label: security
apiKey.description: API Key to access Google. Mandatory for Google GeoCoding server.

clientId.label: security
clientId.description: Client ID to access Google GeoCoding server.

clientKey.label: security
clientKey.description: Client Key to access Google GeoCoding server.
